project_abstract.cdata: The project has the following specific objectives:  (a) to relieve traffic congestion which is restraining economic growth in the Hangzhou-Ningbo corridor, and provide a high standard road transport link in support of agricultural and industrial development; (b) to provide support for a Road Development Program (RDP); (c) to further develop institutional capabilities for transport planning and determination of investment priorities; and (d) to promote the transfer of highway construction and maintenance technology through training and the provision of modern equipment.  The project includes: (a) construction of a 138 km section of the four-lane divided, access-controlled Hangzhou-Ningbo Highway on a new alignment; (b) construction and improvement of about 33 sections of provincial and country road networks, primarily in the southern region of the Province; (c) consultant services for supervising construction of the Hangzhou-Ningbo Highway; (d) staff training; and (e) purchase of equipment for road laboratories, environmental protection, road research, a road data bank, a pavement management system, road maintenance and highway operation.

P003534.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>浙江公路项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的具体目标是：（1）缓解交通拥堵，消除制约杭州至宁波经济发展的因素；建设高标准连接道，支持工农业发展；（2）向道路建设工程提供支持；（3）进一步提升制定交通规划和确定投资重点的机构能力；（4）通过提供培训和现代化设备，促进公路施工养护技术转让。项目内容包括：（1）沿新线路建设杭州至宁波138公里出入受管制的双向四车道分隔路段；（2）建设并改造约33段省道和国道，这些路段主要位于浙南地区；（3）就杭州至宁波公路施工监理提供咨询服务；（4）开展人员培训；（5）购置公路实验室、环境保护、道路研究、道路数据银行、路面管理系统、道路养护和公路运行所需设备。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
